result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: from Racine County Alternatives Program - Incident Report

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel Santiago
Current: 3800 Green St., Racine, WI 53402 United States  (Effective: 10-26-2022)
Prior: 2114 16Th St., Racine, WI 53403 United States

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances. This is to be monitored through random drug screens and/or breathalyzers by the Racine County Alternatives Program, Room MC340 (Law Enforcement Center 717 Wisconsin Ave Racine WI 53403). New referrals from Court must report on the day of their Court appearance.  Jail releases must report the following business day (M-Fr 8am-4:30pm).  In addition to random testing, the defendant is further ordered to test after each court appearance. No contact with the Co-Defendant MH (person, property, residence or family).

9:10 AM Defendant Daniel Santiago in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Dirk Christian Jensen in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski. 
Matter here for bond forfeiture hearing and also a bond hearing requested by defendant.
State takes no position on bond.
BTC: Cash bond reinstated and cash bond amended to $500 cash, same conditions.
SPD has not yet appointed counsel for defendant.
